module.name: Conference Pro
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php Adds ability to manage Conference Room settings into the User Control Panel and also to create Conference IVRs
module.changelog: *2.11.0.13* Sales cleanup *2.11.0.10* Fix conference list ivr from showing as a bad dest *2.11.0.9* #6823 *2.11.0.8* Fix spelling issue *2.11.0.7* Fix issue where sales page was being cut off *2.11.0.6* Fix sales display when not licensed *2.11.0.5* Doing a reload as well. *2.11.0.3* Fix bugs, add name, pin, adminpin, add js checks, add sales page *2.11.0.2* Fix ARI crashing on uninstall issues
